title: Design, synthesis, and biological evaluation of novel quinoline-based EGFR/HER-2 dual-target inhibitors as potential anti-tumor agents
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32978-32991
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06394E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Lamya H. Al-Wahaibi, Essmat M. El-Sheref, Hendawy N. Tawfeek, Hesham A. Abou-Zied, Safwat M. Rabea, Stefan Bräse, Bahaa G. M. Youssif
A series of new quinoline-based derivatives was designed and synthesised. The structures of the new compounds were validated by IR, NMR, and elemental analysis. The new compounds were evaluated as antiproliferative agents targeting EGFR, and HER2.
